name: Crimp LD46 (Two Wolf)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

  • Mix ingredients to make medicine and give them to infected houses.
  • Make the final Panacea to do “something” and win the game!

ALL KEYS

  • WASD to move
  • LClick to use current weapon
  • RClick (or Number Hotkeys) to toggle through weapons
  • Q & E or Mouse Scroll to toggle through items
  • SPACE to interact, add item to caldron or use medicine on houses
  • TAB for recipe
  • Z to flush caldron
  • R to remove item in current slot
  • ZXC to shop near shop centers

v2.0 (After Jam)

  • Added number hotkeys for weapons
  • Changed all text to better resolution
  • Changed the tilemaps to composites - runs faster
  • Minor tweaks for better responsiveness
  • Outlined UI

This is the final version. Thank you for playing!
